mapper.update: update supplier set use=#{use} where code=#{code}
mapper.select: select nvl(count(code), 0) from supplier where classification like '%'||#{search1}||'%' and name like '%'||#{search2}||'%'

select * from (select rownum R, S.* from (select * from supplier where classification like '%'||#{search1}||'%' AND name like '%'||#{search2}||'%' order by code desc) S) where R between #{startRow} and #{lastRow}
